audioText: Demain, tu regarderas mon visage pour voir si j'ai bien dormi cette nuit.
question: What will the person look at tomorrow?
options: The speaker's face to see if they slept well
explanation: The text states 'Demain, tu regarderas mon visage pour voir si j'ai bien dormi cette nuit' - Tomorrow, you will look at my face to see if I slept well tonight. 'Regarderas' is the future tense of 'regarder' (to look), and 'visage' means face.
